content:
when I open 'more PMs' in electron I can't see stream anymore. It extends too far and there is no scroll bar.
pasted image

@Matthias MÃ¼ller Did you click on 'more conversations' to get into that state, or do you have lots of unread PM threads? (Either way it's something we need to fix, but I'm curious why it hasn't come up before.)
it happens every time I click it

I think the problem here is that we're mimicking the "more topics" behavior of zooming to the stream, which works well.

But we don't hide the "Home" above, which creates the confusion that you're seeing everything and thus scrolling down will get you to the other things, and we don't have the "back" button. I think we should align this UI with "more topics". Thoughts?
Brock is travelling, but if we can figure out what we want, I imagine @Jack Zhang or @Cory Lynch would be up for working on this.

I'd like to make those two experiences more consistent. I don't think it's entirely analogous to remove the Home button for more PMs as it is to remove all the other streams for more topics.

I feel like we should consider having both "zoom" experiences just take over the left sidebar completely and have a "back" link.
